title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: It's that time of the year where business get ready to do the Black Friday deals with their product and services. Online casinos are not left out too. on Friday, Nov 26th, which is Black Friday, most casinos will offer he match bonuses, some signup bonuses, free chips, and of course free spins. So if you happen to be someone who wants to get the most value for your deposits and wagers, the 26th of November could be the day that you’ve been waiting for. Suppose your favorite online casinos don't offer any Black Friday bonuses, would you try other casinos that do or stay loyal to them?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on November 15, 2022, 05:20:18 PMIt's that time of the year where business get ready to do the Black Friday deals with their product and services. Suppose your favorite online casinos don't offer any Black Friday bonuses, would you try other casinos that do or stay loyal to them?Bonuses don't play much of a role in my decision to gamble, so ultimately I will go to place bets where I feel my money is safest from scams or other fishy behavior.  Sure, it's nice to get a bonus, but I'm a bit too cynical to think that casinos are offering them out of the goodness of their hearts.  More likely it's just another way to advertise for them and I'm sure this section of the forum will be flooded with various Black Friday offers.  However, I would say to pay attention to which sites are the most trusted, instead of looking at who has the shiniest lights outside of their building to attract customers...  A lot of the time it's the users who end up paying for these various bonuses in the end as nothing is free to develop and implement.  More important to me is knowing my money is safe.
